div.p: Non-CpG methylation in relation to TE expression in the brain. Figure shows the non-CpG methylation level in TEs, 2 kb upstream, and 2 kb downstream regions in relation to expression, presented as fragments per kilobase of transcript per million mapped fragments (FPKM). Active TEs (FPKM > 0) show lower non-CpG methylation levels compared to inactive TEs (FPKM = 0)
